page.title: 10CARDROSS _ EDUCATION
page.content: {PRIMARY SCHOOL-}THE SCHOOL HAS A ROLL OF JUST OVER 200 PUPILS AND 8 FULL TIME TEACHERS. THERE IS A PART TIME REMEDIAL TEACHER, VISITING TEACHERS IN MUSIC AND P.E. A VIOLIN TEACHER PROVIDES INDIVIDUAL TUITION. THE HEAD- TEACHER IS MRS. MARGARET PEOPLES. SECONDARY PUPILS TRAVEL TO HELENSBURGH TO HERMITAGE ACADEMY. {PRIMARY SCHOOL ASSOCIATION-}FORMED ABOUT 7 YEARS AGO, THIS GROUP IS ACTIVE IN SUPPORTING THE SCHOOL. HELP IS GIVEN RUNNING BOOK AND TUCK SHOPS. FUND RAISING EVENTS ARE RUN REGULARLY. {INDUSTRIAL ACTION-}AT THE TIME OF WRITING, EDUCATION IN SCOTLAND IS IN THE THROES OF A CAMPAIGN FOR AN INDEPENDANT REVIEW ON PAY AND CONDITIONS. HALF OF THE STAFF SUPPORTS THE ACTION.
